entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: NNE 57 km/h gust 73 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 near Cape Race. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
